page.title: 04CHILTERN PARK ESTATE
page.content: Chiltern Park Estate, Thornbury is a typical, modern, open plan housing estate consisting of about 380 relatively expensive, Georgian style houses. There are no amenities on the estate which was built about 10 years ago. Most residents travel into Bristol for their employment although some of the wives work locally. The families mostly own two vehicles and have more than one income each week. The majority do not live near their extended family. They have moved to their present houses from all over the country, including Bristol, but the majority previously lived within Thornbury. Their leisure activities are varied but sports and keep fit are the most popular. The residents enjoy living on this estate although about one third of them would prefer to have more playgrounds or parks.
